Title: Nanban
Writer: Rajkumar Hirani (screenplay), Abhijat Joshi (screenplay), Madhan Karky (dialogue), S. Shankar (dialogue)
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Jiiva, Srikanth, Ileana D'Cruz
Plot: 10 years after finishing college, two best friends and their enemy go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.
